channel.title: How Would I link em up
channel.description: Hello all, I'm currently making a PS and I'm using Testscape source, I want to make it so ppl who Join don't need Hamatchi, How would I go about doing this and where would I put my ip ETC in the source, Also I have a no-ip ready, My server is working fine, however when I log on it says connnection from LOCALHOST not kanescape.no-ip.org, so that others can get on. Ideas?

item.title: How Would I link em up
item.dc:creator: @Kaneb1997 Kaneb1997
item.description:
@Kaneb1997 wrote:

Lol I wish I was trolling… and thanks every1 who posted!

EDIT: Strange, i can get on fine on my computer, however on another I just says can not connect :(, any ideas?

Read full topic
item.source: How Would I link em up

item.title: How Would I link em up
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

krackkid:

I hope your trolling, I really do.

This ^

As the hoster you connect on localhost… and your players connect on your no-ip/ip address.

item.source: How Would I link em up

item.title: How Would I link em up
item.dc:creator: @fuery0w fuery0w
item.description:
@fuery0w wrote:

Like infalibl3 said, go into the Client’s folder and in either Egui.java, Gui.java or even Client.java and search for the server ip. If you don’t know it just try searching ’ no-ip ’ , if not then search ’ localhost’ , ’ 127.0.0.1’ or ’ 0.0.0.0 ’ . But you have to change it in the Source folder aswell.

Read full topic
item.source: How Would I link em up

item.title: How Would I link em up
item.dc:creator: @infalibl3 infalibl3
item.description:
@infalibl3 wrote:

if you’ve portforwarded, go into the client and search ‘127.0.0.1’ in the gui.java, egui.java or client.java, and change it to your no-ip. source sided, you would go into server.java or client.java and search ‘no-ip’ or ‘127.0.0.1’ and change it to your no-ip. portforward on port 43594.

Read full topic
item.source: How Would I link em up
